channel.title: I need Ogre emotes
channel.description:
Does anybody have the ogre emote ids? I need attack, block, dead and slash bash's (zogre flesh eaters quest boss) range emote. I don't need the walking and standing emotes right now, but if you have the ids post them here if you want.
I use the emotes for Bandos Godwars.
Also, don't post me hill giant emote ids. They don't work, I have tested it.

item.title: I need Ogre emotes
